The commonly used tracer Technetium-99m label Mercaptoacetyltriglycine ( [ Tc-99m ] -Mertiatide [ Tc-99m ] -MAG3 ) . DOC.brief_title: A Single Centre Open Label Comparison I-123-Ortho-Iodohippuric Acid ( OIH ) With Tc-99m-Mercaptoacetyltriglycine ( MAG3 ) Assessment Renal Tubular Function
